tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ depressing) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBD lost) (NP (DT a) (NN follower)))))) (: ...)))
